job.title: Machine Learning Engineer - Computer Vision
job.description: ltpgtBased in Austin Texas our client is a rapidlygrowing consulting firm that specializes in Artificial Intelligence strategy and custom product development Their goal is to help companies come up with custom solutions and optimize their use of AI They believe in a practical approach where they can apply their techniques creatively on new cases and provide consistent results They work with customers ranging from bigbox companies to tech startups and are looking to disrupt the tech markets with exceptional products and revolutionary business models Our client wants AI to be a more accessible tool for everyone Their mission  Democratize AIltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtTo support a rapidly a expanding pipeline of cool project for a growing client base they are looking for a ltstronggtSenior Machine Learning Engineerltstronggt who can oversee the complete lifecycle of their products from ensuring project delivery and quality to client managementltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat you will get to do as a Machine Learning Engineerltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtyou will sit at the cuttingedge of machine learning and software engineering ltligtltligtYou will be responsible for designing and developing AI and machine learning applications for our growing client base ltligtltligtYou will join a team of experienced engineers and entrepreneurs bringing practical AI solutions to the market Your responsibilities will include ltligtltligtDesigning and developing machine learning models ltligtltligtRunning machine learning tests and experiments ltligtltligtEvaluating new techniques and making technical recommendations ltligtltligtRunning numerous experiments in a fastpaced and fun environment ltligtltligtMentoring junior machine learning engineers to improve their technical skills ltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtCore Requirements for a Machine Learning EngineerltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBS Masters or PhD in Computer Science or equivalent work experience ltligtltligt3 years of industry experience in machine learning or related field ltligtltligtProgramming experience with Python Java or C and other leadingedge languagesltligtltligtYou should have strong programming skills and professional experience in one or more of the following areasltligtltligtAI and Machine Learning ltligtltligtComputer Vision ltligtltligtNatural Language Processing ltligtltligtHardworking with a proven ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines ltligtltligtExcellent interpersonal skills and ability to get along with engineers at all levels ltligtltligtYou should take ownership over the things you build and be eager to learn new skills ltligtltligtAny type of security clearance  ltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhats in it for you as a Machine Learning EngineerltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtGreat compensation plan includes salary plus comprehensive benefitsltligtltligtExperience working on a variety of leadingedge projects in a variety of industries and for a variety of local Austin clients ltligtltligtWork side by side with brilliant engineers applying AI to realworld problems ltligtltligtGet access to a variety of health care options provides by recruitAbilityai ltligtltligtWe are committed to building an inclusive culture thats professional and hardworking thats also fun collaborative and openltligtltulgtltpgtltpgt
